title: Minecraft 15w32a 发布
author: obby825
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2015-8-5 22:53 编辑 
每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。

然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。
适用于正式版的MOD不兼容预览版，而且大多数MOD都不提供对每周快照的支持。
Minecraft 1.9 仍未发布，15w32a为其第4个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。



Another week, another snapshot. We are currently focusing on getting all the new content that we have planned into the snapshots, but it will take a little time until we see it all there. This week we have spent some time laying down the ground work for better boss fight AI and upgrade paths between worlds, so we can do even cooler stuff in the following weeks’ snapshots.
新的一周，新的快照！我们正在加快向快照添加新特性的进度，但这需要时间直到我们完成。本周我们花时间专注于更好的BOSS的攻击AI，并更新世界间的路径，这样我们能够在接下来的快照中有更更酷的东西。



Thanks to everyone who reported bugs for the snapshots last week. We were very eager to see how many problems are reported for the first snapshots in many months and we are positively surprised by the fact that we saw less problems than expected.
感谢上周所有汇报BUG的人。我们非常渴望看见在这几个月里对于第一个快照有多少问题被汇报，事实上，我们看到的问题比预期的少，我们感到惊讶。

Here are some of the improvements since last week:
下面是从上个星期以来的改进：

Improved Ender Dragon fight, now with more cowbell!
Better handling of using items in both the mainhand and offhand.
Some monsters have problems with their vision now, but we don’t have the time to code glasses for them.
Generic upgrade path for world saves, this is very technical internal stuff that you’ll only notice if it goes wrong, but it makes our lives easy.
Added a thing to the system with the values. Can’t be more specific, no spoilers.
改进了末影龙的战斗，现在更加刺激！
更好地处理双手使用物品。
有些怪物的视力有些问题，但是我们没有时间给它们戴眼镜。
通用的对于世界存档的升级，这也是个技术活，你只会在它出错时注意到它，但是这使得生活变得更容易。
在系统中添加了一个东西的值。我不能说的更多了，不能剧透。

And some bug fixes:
还有一些BUG修正：

[Bug MC-48730] – Nametags still show while player is invisible and on team
[Bug MC-48730] – 玩家名称在玩家隐形且在队伍中时依然显示
[Bug MC-82833] – Shulker projectile follows player in spectator mode and creative mode
[Bug MC-82833] – 潜影贝的弹射物在旁观模式和创造模式跟着玩家
[Bug MC-84035] – Enderdragon can't die unless perched on portal
[Bug MC-84035] – 末影龙只有在到达传送门时才会死
[Bug MC-84078] – When fishing rod is cast, all fishing rods look like it was cast out to sea too
[Bug MC-84078] – 当钓鱼竿扔出时，所有的钓鱼竿看起来好像被扔出
[Bug MC-84253] – almost all potion and tipped arrows are black
[Bug MC-84253] – 几乎所有药水和药水箭都变黑了
[Bug MC-84584] – Placing End Rod on End Rod sends "hslsdjfksdlk" to output log twice
[Bug MC-84584] – 在End Rod上放置End Rod会在输出两次"hslsdjfksdlk"

A note for everybody else: Back up your world before updating. Things will break, especially in such an early snapshot. Backup your world. Back it up. Do it now.
给任何人的提示：在升级前备份存档！如果不备份的话你的东西会被破坏，尤其是在早期的快照。备份！备份！备份！

Please report any and all bugs you find in Minecraft to bugs.mojang.com. If nobody reports a bug, we can’t fix it!
在bugs.mojang.com报告Minecraft的BUG。没人汇报BUG的话，我们不会修复它！

To get snapshots, open your launcher and press the “New Profile” button. Call it “snapshots” and check the box saying “Enable experimental development snapshots” and save. To switch to the normal version, you can select it in the dropdown at the bottom left corner of the launcher. Back up your world first or run the game on in a different folder (See the “new profile” dialog).
为了获得快照，打开启动器并点击New Profile按钮，打开snapshots并选择Enable experimental development snapshots并点击保存。如果要选择普通的版本，你可以选择在下拉菜单中在启动器左下角的按钮上面。在开始快照前备份你的世界或在不同的文件夹中启动（见new profile对话框）

Snapshots can corrupt your world, please backup and/or run them in a different folder from your main worlds.
快照可能毁坏存档，记得备份和/或在与你的存档不同文件夹里运行。


跨平台服务器JAR: http://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... t_server.15w32a.jar



正版启动器下载地址Windowshttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.exeMac/OSXhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.dmgLinux/Otherhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.jar
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全PC平台。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。
关注最新版本资讯，请关注mcbbs新闻版 Minecraft官方版本信息索引（自正式版1.0.0至今）与版规
关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注稍后 Minecraft 1.9（战斗更新）特性列表 的更新。
外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Mojang官方博客（英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需翻墙）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需翻墙）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需翻墙）TheMogMiner的Twitter（英文，内地需翻墙）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需翻墙）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Version history页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细，很慢）
